author: Helen Regan, CNN
title: Air pollution falls by unprecedented levels in major global cities during coronavirus lockdowns
description: Lockdowns restricting travel and industry imposed to halt the spread of coronavirus have resulted in unprecedented reductions in deadly air pollution around the world, new analysis shows.
content:
(CNN)Lockdowns restricting travel and industry imposed to halt the spread of coronavirus have resulted in unprecedented reductions in deadly air pollution around the world, new analysis shows.
